projects.title: Budget Application
projects.description: This application is built using AngularJS and is something I use every month to create a budget for myself.

projects.title: CU College of Nursing
projects.imgAlt: Screenshot of the CU College of Nursing Homepage
projects.description: For my day job, I am the webmaster for the CU College of Nursing. The website is currently built on Sharepoint 2010, and I'm doing what I can to revamp the pages and site architecture to be more modern.

projects.title: Faculty Bios
projects.imgAlt: Screenshot of a College of Nursing Faculty Bio page
projects.description: I redesigned and rebuilt 120 faculty bio pages for the College of Nursing using AngularJS and a Sharepoint list. The list feeds data to the AngularJS app which in turn populates the page. Previously, the pages were individually built and managed with in-page HTML and there were three different "designs".

projects.title: MyCON Intranet
projects.imgAlt: Screenshot of the CU College of Nursing Intranet homepage
projects.description: In the summer of 2017, I was tasked with redesigning and rebuilding the CU College of Nursing Intranet. I only had six weeks to complete the project, so I was limited to the platform Central IT provided (Sharepoint 2013). I completed the project in the requested timeframe and have been managing and making improvements ever since.
